DOC.brief_summary: A Phase IIA , open-label , multicenter , active-controlled , parallel-group clinical trial design evaluate safety efficacy two dos Bucillamine compare low-dose Colchicine treatment patient acute gout flare .

DOC.detailed_description: To evaluate safety tolerability two regimen Bucillamine 100 mg ( 900 mg 1,800 mg ) seven day treatment compare Colchicine 0.6 mg ( 1.8 mg ) treatment patient acute gout flare
